venue.name: Portsmouth Dog Park @ South Mill Pond

item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a very special SUNDAY meetup in NEW HAMPSHIRE!

Come play at the South Mill Park from 10am - 12pm. Then after your frenchie is done playing, head on over to the Portsmouth Open Market around the corner at the Strawbery Banke Museum. Frenchies are VERY welcome at this outdoor craft & farmers market. In fact, Nino's mom will be there with her Bonjour Nino line of jewelry.

Meetup dues are $3 per frenchie...this covers the $12 monthly fee to host our meetup.com group online. Anything received in excess of the $12 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Thanks so much, Nino can't wait to see you!
item.how_to_find_us: The dog park is in South Mill Park between South Mill Pond and the public tennis courts.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: August French Bulldog Meetup
